data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in the half of Bielefeld.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Wolfsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
Free kick for Bielefeld in their own half.
Manuel Grafe awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Manuel Grafe signals a Wolfsburg throw-in in Bielefeld's half.
Ball safe as Bielefeld is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Bielefeld.
In the minute 6, Bielefeld awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Wolfsburg, Bielefeld push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
In the minute 10, Fabian Klos (Bielefeld) has received a first yellow card.
Wolfsburg push upfield but Manuel Grafe quickly pulls them for offside.
Wolfsburg's Renato Steffen misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 12, Ball goes out of play for a Bielefeld goal kick.
Bielefeld awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bielefeld to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Wolfsburg in their own half.
Wolfsburg needs to be cautious. Bielefeld have an attacking throw-in.
Can Wolfsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bielefeld's half?
In the minute 18, Free kick Wolfsburg.
Wout Weghorst is on target to give Wolfsburg a 1-0 advantage.
Great play from Maximilian Arnold to set up the goal.
In the minute 20, Maximilian Arnold puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
Admir Mehmedi instrumental with a fine assist.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Bielefeld in the half of Wolfsburg.
Manuel Grafe signals a Bielefeld throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Bielefeld.
Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Bielefeld in their own half.
Throw-in Wolfsburg.
In the minute 26, Bielefeld awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Wolfsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Wolfsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bielefeld's half?
In the minute 29, Play has been interrupted briefly in Wolfsburg to check on Josuha Guilavogui, who is grimacing with pain.
Bielefeld have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 32, It's a goal kick for the home team in Wolfsburg.
Throw-in for Bielefeld at Volkswagen Arena.
Oliver Glasner (Wolfsburg) is making a first substitution, with Xaver Schlager replacing Josuha Guilavogui.
Manuel Grafe awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
Wolfsburg to take a throw-in in Bielefeld territory.
Free kick for Bielefeld in the half of Wolfsburg.
In the minute 38, Manuel Grafe awards Bielefeld a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Bielefeld in Wolfsburg.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in their own half.
In the minute 40, Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Bielefeld.
Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
In the minute 42, Wolfsburg's Maximilian Philipp is on target but unsuccessful.
Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Bielefeld in their own half.
Bielefeld to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Wolfsburg push forward at Volkswagen Arena and Maximilian Philipp gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bielefeld defence.
Manuel Grafe signals a throw-in for Wolfsburg, close to Bielefeld's area.
Maximilian Philipp for Wolfsburg is back on the field again.
Bielefeld have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
In the minute 45, Maximilian Philipp is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
The second-half is now underway.
Bielefeld make their first substitution with Nils Seufert replacing Arne Maier.
In the minute 46, Uwe Neuhaus is making the team's second substitution at Volkswagen Arena with Brian Behrendt replacing Nathan De Medina.
Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wolfsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Bielefeld get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in their own half.
In the minute 49, Maximilian Arnold for Wolfsburg has been booked by Manuel Grafe and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Bielefeld in the half of Wolfsburg.
Goal kick for Bielefeld at Volkswagen Arena.
Throw-in Bielefeld.
In the minute 53, Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
Throw-in for Bielefeld at Volkswagen Arena.
Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, Manuel Grafe signals a Bielefeld throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
In Wolfsburg, Wout Weghorst (Wolfsburg) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Wolfsburg drives forward and Renato Steffen gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 58, Can Wolfsburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bielefeld's half?
Bielefeld's Ritsu Doan gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Wolfsburg defender.
Bielefeld have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
In the minute 60, Ball safe as Wolfsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bielefeld to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
Free kick for Bielefeld in their own half.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Bielefeld in the half of Wolfsburg.
Can Bielefeld get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
Manuel Grafe signals a Bielefeld throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
In the minute 65, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Bielefeld in their own half.
Wolfsburg advance rapidly upfield but Manuel Grafe blows for offside.
Wolfsburg to take a throw-in in Bielefeld territory.
In the minute 67, Joao Victor is replacing Admir Mehmedi for Wolfsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
Goal kick for Wolfsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Bielefeld in the half of Wolfsburg.
Manuel Grafe signals a Bielefeld throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
In Wolfsburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Bielefeld.
Wolfsburg will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Bielefeld.
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
In the minute 75, Maxence Lacroix (Wolfsburg) gets in a shot â€“ but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Manuel Grafe awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg close to the penalty box.
Wolfsburg drive upfield and Renato Steffen gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bielefeld defender.
In the minute 77, The away team have replaced Sergio Cordova with Sven Schipplock. This is the third substitution made today by Uwe Neuhaus.
Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Bielefeld.
In the minute 78, Wolfsburg's Maximilian Philipp has been booked in Wolfsburg.
In Wolfsburg Bielefeld attack through Marcel Hartel. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolfsburg goal kick.
In the minute 80, Sven Schipplock strikes to reduce the deficit to 2-1 at Volkswagen Arena.
That's a fine assist from Ritsu Doan.
Can Bielefeld get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
In the minute 81, Manuel Grafe signals a throw-in for Bielefeld, close to Wolfsburg's area.
Ball safe as Wolfsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
In the minute 83, Manuel Prietl hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Bielefeld!
It's a goal kick for the home team in Wolfsburg.
Felix Klaus is on a sub for Maximilian Philipp for Wolfsburg.
In the minute 84, The home team have replaced Renato Steffen with Yannick Gerhardt. This is the fourth substitution made today by Oliver Glasner.
Throw-in Bielefeld.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in the half of Bielefeld.
In the minute 85, Free kick Bielefeld.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Wolfsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bielefeld's half?
Manuel Grafe awards Bielefeld a goal kick.
In the minute 87, The away team replace Mike Van der Hoorn with Joan Edmundsson.
Manuel Grafe awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 88, In Wolfsburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Bielefeld's Brian Behrendt breaks free at Volkswagen Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Wolfsburg have a goal kick.
Wolfsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg needs to be cautious. Bielefeld have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Bielefeld in the half of Wolfsburg.
Wout Weghorst of Wolfsburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Bielefeld at Volkswagen Arena.
Manuel Grafe blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
